ARG BASE_IMAGE=agones-build-sdk-base:latest
FROM $BASE_IMAGE

RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_11.x | bash - && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nodejs && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# code generation scripts
COPY *.sh /root/
RUN chmod +x /root/*.sh
